dmca.title: DMCA INFRINGEMENT NOTICE
dmca.body:
March 29, 2006
 	
Sender:
DHR Technologies, Inc
12800 University Drive
Suite 220
Fort Myers, Florida, USA
+1.239.790.0000
bill@slbb.com
Skyline Broadband
http://www.slbb.com/ 

Recipient(s):
Skylink Broadband Pakistan
Toshi Square, Block 13, Gulshan Iqbal
Karachi
Pakistan
+92 304 229 3 229
info@slbb.us

SkyLink Broadband: http://www.slbb.us 

Sent via: email
Re: NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT - http://www.slbb.us/ 

As there is no DMCA contact information listed under http://www.slbb.us . I am sending this to the current administrative contact listed under WHOIS as of March 29, 2006. If you are not the agent designated to deal with DMCA takedown notices for slbb.us, please forward this information to said agent.

This is a NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT for materials found under the site SkyLink Broadband at http://www.slbb.us/ This notice is being sent in compliance with the Digital Millenium Copyright Act (17 USC 512).

This is a request to remove or disable access to material found under the URL http://www.slbb.us/  This information was copied without permission from the copyrighted material that is posted at http://www.slbb.com/  The archive.org history page for Skyline Broadband
http://web.archive.org/web/20040102130209/http://www.slbb.com/  clearly shows the content being copied verbatim and being modified thereafter, which is in violation of United States Copyright law.

I did not authorize licensing the content under and was never contacted to see if the material could be copied for use on your web site. The user SkyLink Broadband Pakistan had no right to license the content under any license. 

Therefore, pursuant to the DMCA, I hereby request that you expeditiously remove or disable access to the infringing content. I have a good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted material above is not authorized by the copyright owner under law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this takedown notice is accurate to the best of my knowledge, and that I am the copyright owner of the work described above.

If you have any questions about the DMCA, and your rights and obligations as a service provider (17 USC 512(k)) under the act, please refer to the Chilling Effects Clearinghouse at http://www.chillingeffects.org/  which is an excellent source for information regarding DMCA and DMCA takedown notices. 

Please note that my contact information is private, and must not be used for any purpose other than dealing with this notice. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

William Laakkonen
VP Sales
DHR Technologies, Inc dba Skyline Broadband
12800 University Drive
Suite 220 
Fort Myers, Florida
USA
+1.239.790.0000
